ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Inbound_Enquiry', AND( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Closure_Code__c, 'Response Given'), ISPICKVAL( Closure_Code__c, 'Redirected'), ISPICKVAL( Closure_Code__c, 'Tier 3 Referred'), ISPICKVAL( Closure_Code__c, 'Agent Referred') ) ), LEN ( Closure_Details__c ) < 20 ), AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Outreach', LEN(Closure_Details__c) < 20, OR( ISPICKVAL(Closure_Code__c,'Successful - Phone'), ISPICKVAL(Closure_Code__c,'Successful - Email'), ISPICKVAL(Closure_Code__c,'Successful - Message') ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Closure Details of at least 20 characters are required when Status is set to Closed
